issue.subject: Issue when deleting a resource
issue.description:
Two cases :

1/ Resource object is not deleted when the last version of it is deleted
When deleting the last version of a resource, the resource itself must be deleted and it's not the case.
The confirmation message, which popped up after the deletion request, is right : it asks a confirmation for the resource deletion, but only linked metatada and version are removed.
For now, SQL requests are the only way to cleared the database of the obsolete resource objects.

2/ If the XML metadata is not found in geonetwork, the database objects are not deleted
If for any reason, the XML metadata of the resource is not found in geonetwork, easySDI abort the deletion process.
It should going on and delete all objects related to this non existing metadata (resource, version and metadata entries).
